profileAlternative.name: JT Haskell
profileAlternative.headline: Director of Recruiting at Zapier - on parental leave until January but will get back to you ASAP.
profileAlternative.summary: Experienced talent acquisition leader building industry-leading software companies in security, cloud, machine learning, and mobile. Expert in sourcing, executive search, technical recruiting, and building high-performing, global, recruiting teams. Strong human resources, immigration, and employment law experience. Passionate about candidate experience and delivering for hiring managers.

aboutAlternative.text: Experienced talent acquisition leader building industry-leading software companies in security, cloud, machine learning, and mobile. Expert in sourcing, executive search, technical recruiting, and building high-performing, global, recruiting teams. Strong human resources, immigration, and employment law experience. Passionate about candidate experience and delivering for hiring managers.

positions.title: Director of Recruiting
positions.description: We're a 100% remote team living and working all over the world to help you automate the most tedious parts of your day to day job.

positions.title: Director of Talent Acquisition
positions.description:
Some of what I was doing:
- Directed global recruiting team and operations responsible for Pindrop's expansion across all business units and university programs
- Interview training and development optimization as we scale
- Employment branding and engagement
- Constantly hacked new automated sourcing and outreach methods to quickly build pipelines
- Increasing our interviewing efficiency for an incredible candidate experience for both our teams and candidates
- International hiring, legal, and vendor management
- Responsible for administering Greenhouse ATS and performance analytics
- Responsible for executive and other senior-level searches
…
see more

positions.title: Talent Acquisition Lead
positions.description: Talent Acquisition team lead focused across the entire business. Later, lead the expansion of the R&D and Engineering teams from 50 to 650 globally. AirWatch grew from 180 to 2,200 employees globally during my three years there with a small but strong team of recruiters. AirWatch was acquired by VMware in 2014 for $1.5B.

positions.title: Talent Acquisition Manager
positions.description:
Cobalt Talon was a startup that built a PaaS analytics product specific to the healthcare payer industry.

Managed full life cycle recruiting including HR responsibilities of on boarding, benefits and immigration.
Developed operational processes, sourcing strategies and talent pipelines.
Implemented a careers page and employment banding strategy.
Assisted with opening of the corporate headquarters.
Recruited in-house operational teams, product development and hosting operations with the following skills. Architects, software engineers, infrastructure engineers, QA, ETL and customer support, Teradata, MicroStrategy, QlikView, Talend, Hadoop.
…
see more

positions.title: Talent Acquisition Manager
positions.location: Greater Atlanta Area, Boston, Chicago, Montreal, Toronto, Raleigh
positions.description:
Recruited and managed recruitment operations for eastern US and Canada across 11 sites. Team consisted of recruiters, recruiting coordinators, and a project manager.
Lead recruitment for Nokia smart devices (acquired by Microsoft $7.2B) and location services (acquired by German auto group $2.71B).
Success integration of multiple acquisitions for the internet services division including Plum, Metacarta, and Novarra.
North / South America Project Manager for SuccessFactors ATS implementation.
Continued to expand Nokia's presence and participation with universities, conferences and local user groups.
Recruited new organizations in cloud services, semantic web, data analytics, mobile applications services, developer operations (DevOps), location based services (LBS) and all other business operations positions (HR, sales, finance).
…
see more

given.text:
JT quickly became indispensable in finding and landing technical talent for our 24/7 hosting operations team. His ability to understand the demands of the roles, map those to quality candidates with current skills and cultural fit, and get them excited about joining our group, made hiring fast and easy for me. His knowledge of the business environment, competitive landscape, and potential sources of candidates meant we were able to craft roles and descriptions in a way that attracted truly great team members. I’ve had the opportunity to leverage JT’s help in multiple diverse hiring situations over several years. I would ask his help again for any new roles given the chance, and would specifically recommend him to anyone building a technical team.
…
See more

I had the opportunity to work closely with J.T. while he was our contract recruiter in Alpharetta. He is an exceptional recruiter that is well connected in the IT community. His strong technical knowledge allowed him to establish immediate repoire and credibility with managers and candidates. J.T. applied innovative sourcing and networking approaches to locate top-notch talent. He is an extremely self-motivated, high performer that I would highly recommend.
…
See more

JT is one of the most professional recruiters I've had the pleasure of working with. He demonstrated determination, reliability, promptness, and initiative. Whenever I asked a question, he would go find an answer, and without delay. When he linked me with Nokia, my current employer, the fact that Nokia chose such an efficient and dependable person as a first contact with potential employees was a definite factor in my decision to accept a position. It made Nokia stand out among other employers I have spoken with as having strong judgment in quality individuals, implying that my future coworkers would also be talented. I strongly recommend JT as a capable recruiter.
…
See more

JT is a focused, organized, and friendly worker who is able to quickly and efficiently locate skilled candidates for technical positions. His technical know-how helps him identify talent and his people skills make working with him a pleasure. JT is an asset to any organization!

I had the pleasure of working with JT for almost a year. He was a great colleague and resource to have in the office. I had just started recruiting at the time I met JT and his training and assistance were critical to my success. He is an excellent recruiter and I would recommend him for any project.

received.text: Josh quickly came up to speed with a complicated internal recruiting process at Nokia, that changed often. He proved time and again to take on the hardest to please hiring managers, set proper expectations and deliver. Some of the organizations he supported went through extensive transitions in both product and physical location changes. Yet Josh just pressed on with a great attitude while recruiting some rare talent for those teams. He is the type of contributor that doesn't require much in management. Give him an objective and he will establish and execute the plan to achieve it.

AirWatch has experienced incredible growth over the past year. Tess has been a patient and persistent recruiting partner in providing top talent during this time. She has succeeded in providing several key hires at the high level AirWatch pursues. She takes time to know our culture and re-target for the right candidate. Tess has consistently provided a pleasant and reliable service level that leaves no surprises. I have really enjoyed working with her and look forward to future collaboration!

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Senior Director of Product at Zapier
Head of Partnerships at Zapier (We're Hiring!)
Co-founder & CEO at Zapier, YC & Mizzou Alum
